In the video, which was filmed by 30-year-old Sharmake Omar in a Minnesota public park, Hendrix admits that she called a young Somali boy the ‚Äún-word‚Äù because ‚Äúhe took my son‚Äôs stuff.‚Äù She then goes on to repeat the slur multiple times before seemingly justifying her actions during the filmed confrontation with Omar.  >‚ÄúIf that's what he's going to act like,‚Äù Hendrix says when asked by Omar why she used the ‚Äún-word‚Äù to describe the child.
